title: The Slicy Smooth 2.0 anti-pinch flat tire insert cuts out new shock absorbing shape
content:
Slicy Products have released the Smooth 2.0 anti-pinch flat tire insert with a honeycomb design said to offer improved shock absorption properties. Not only that, but they have updated the finish to prevent sealant sticking to it, adding cut-outs too to allow sealant to move throughout the tire more freely. Here are all the details. [â€¦]

The post The Slicy Smooth 2.0 anti-pinch flat tire insert cuts out new shock absorbing shape appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
